question:
With reference to the recent inclusion of the Statue of Unity as one of the ‘8 Wonders of SCO’, consider the following statements:
  1. It is the only monument from India to be included in the list.
  2. India holds an observer status in the SCO.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Statue of Unity is the only monument to be included in the ‘8 wonders of SCO’ list. The other monuments are Tamgaly Gorge in Kazakhstan, Navruz Palace in Tajikistan, Po-i-Kalan complex in Uzbekistan, Daming Palace in China, Golden Ring of Russia, etc. Statement 2 is incorrect: India is a member of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation. It acquired membership in 2017 at the SCO summit in Astana (also known as Nur-sultan) in Kazakhstan. Earlier, India held an observer status, from 2005 onwards. The world’s tallest statue in Gujarat was recently included in the 8 wonders list of SCO.
